data.title: Recognizing and Mitigating Bias
data.description: Learn to identify unconscious bias in decision-making and develop strategies to create more equitable processes.
prerequisites: Completion of Foundations of Inclusive Leadership
learning_objectives: Identify different types of unconscious bias
key_takeaways: Everyone has unconscious biases that affect decision-making
Structured processes help reduce the impact of bias
Regular bias training and awareness are essential
Accountability systems ensure consistent application of fair practices
data.name: Recognizing and Mitigating Bias

data.title: Capstone + Live Courageous Conversation
data.description: Week 8: Integrate all learning into real-world application through facilitated courageous conversations.
learning_objectives: Create personal and team action plans
key_takeaways: Earn the "Culture Builder" badge upon completion
Apply concepts through real workplace scenarios
Build essential inclusive workplace skills
Contribute to creating a more equitable culture
data.name: Capstone + Live Courageous Conversation

data.title: Data-Informed Culture & Accountability
data.description: Week 7: Use data and metrics to drive inclusive culture change and maintain accountability for DEI goals.

Apply concepts through real workplace scenarios
Build essential inclusive workplace skills
Contribute to creating a more equitable culture
data.name: Data-Informed Culture & Accountability

Apply concepts through real workplace scenarios
Build essential inclusive workplace skills
Contribute to creating a more equitable culture

Contribute to creating a more equitable culture

data.title: Recognizing and Mitigating Bias
data.description: Learn to identify unconscious bias in decision-making and develop strategies to create more equitable processes.
prerequisites: Completion of Foundations of Inclusive Leadership
learning_objectives: Identify different types of unconscious bias
key_takeaways: Everyone has unconscious biases that affect decision-making
Structured processes help reduce the impact of bias
Regular bias training and awareness are essential
Accountability systems ensure consistent application of fair practices
data.name: Recognizing and Mitigating Bias

data.title: Capstone + Live Courageous Conversation
data.description: Week 8: Integrate all learning into real-world application through facilitated courageous conversations.
learning_objectives: Create personal and team action plans
key_takeaways: Earn the "Culture Builder" badge upon completion
Apply concepts through real workplace scenarios
Build essential inclusive workplace skills
Contribute to creating a more equitable culture
data.name: Capstone + Live Courageous Conversation

data.title: Data-Informed Culture & Accountability
data.description: Week 7: Use data and metrics to drive inclusive culture change and maintain accountability for DEI goals.
learning_objectives: Identify key DEI metrics and indicators
Use data to drive inclusive culture change
key_takeaways: Earn the "Data-Informed Leader" badge upon completion
Apply concepts through real workplace scenarios
Build essential inclusive workplace skills
Contribute to creating a more equitable culture
data.name: Data-Informed Culture & Accountability

data.title: Bystander Intervention & Speaking Up
data.description: Week 6: Learn when and how to intervene as a bystander to create more inclusive environments.
learning_objectives: Build confidence to speak up for others
key_takeaways: Earn the "Ally in Action" badge upon completion
Apply concepts through real workplace scenarios
Build essential inclusive workplace skills
Contribute to creating a more equitable culture
data.name: Bystander Intervention & Speaking Up

data.title: Inclusive Hiring & Advancement
data.description: Week 5: Implement fair and inclusive practices in recruitment, hiring, and career advancement processes.
learning_objectives: Design inclusive job descriptions and requirements
key_takeaways: Earn the "Fair Process Builder" badge upon completion
Apply concepts through real workplace scenarios
Build essential inclusive workplace skills
Contribute to creating a more equitable culture
data.name: Inclusive Hiring & Advancement

data.title: Inclusive Communication & Accessibility
data.description: Week 4: Develop inclusive communication practices and understand accessibility principles for all team members.
key_takeaways: Earn the "Inclusive Communicator" badge upon completion
Apply concepts through real workplace scenarios
Build essential inclusive workplace skills
Contribute to creating a more equitable culture
data.name: Inclusive Communication & Accessibility

data.title: Microaggressions & Repair (A.C.T.I.O.N.)
data.description: Week 3: Learn to recognize microaggressions and practice the A.C.T.I.O.N. framework for response and repair.
learning_objectives: Learn the A.C.T.I.O.N. framework for response
key_takeaways: Earn the "Repair Ready" badge upon completion
Apply concepts through real workplace scenarios
Build essential inclusive workplace skills
Contribute to creating a more equitable culture
data.name: Microaggressions & Repair (A.C.T.I.O.N.)

key_takeaways: Earn the "Bias Aware" badge upon completion
Apply concepts through real workplace scenarios
Build essential inclusive workplace skills
Contribute to creating a more equitable culture

Explain why DEI improves team performance and outcomes
Set personal learning goals and norms for respectful dialogue
key_takeaways: Earn the "DEI Foundations" badge upon completion
Apply concepts through real workplace scenarios
Build essential inclusive workplace skills
Contribute to creating a more equitable culture
